name: ALIEN ANNIHILATION (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
Where in space they came from, we will never know.  All we know is that their bombardment of spinning bombs aimed straight at our cities is a sign of their goal to annihilate the human race.

Alien Annihilation is a class arcade game inspired by the classic Missile Command, written entirely in NextBASIC (2.07k) for the ZX Spectrum Next.  

GAME FEATURES

  • High score
  • Animated sprite graphics
  • AY sound effects
  • Supports Mouse, Keyboard and Joystick
  • Increasing difficulty per level

FOR THE DEVELOPER NERDS

  • A code breakdown document will be coming shortly (just some font and layout editing to do) so keep an eye on this page over the next few days.

Play it as-is, look at the coding and play with it for some learning fun, even edit the code and graphics to make it your own!   Enjoy.
